author: Brian Turner
method: Place the beans, spinach and onion into a bowl and pour over the oil and lemon juice. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well to coat. To serve, place the salad onto a plate.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz green beans, blanched ,  handful baby spinach leaves,  ¼ onion, finely chopped ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
